nodes.description: 自杀式爆炸袭击Lal Shahbaz Qalandar清真寺，造成至少72人死亡、250人受伤，数千人参与苏菲仪式
nodes.support_text: DADU: At least 72 people, including 20 children and nine women, were killed and scores of others were wounded when a suicide bomber ripped through Lal Shahbaz Qalandar Shrine in Sehwan Sharif on Thursday, officials said.

nodes.description: 警方证实爆炸发生在仪式现场，伤者被转移至Liauqat Medical College等医院
nodes.support_text: The explosion took place at the spot where the dhamaal (Sufi ritual) was being performed, within the premises of the shrine.

nodes.description: 应急部门宣布对海得拉巴、贾姆舒尔和谢赫万地区所有医院实施紧急状态
nodes.support_text: Hyderabad Commissioner Qazi Shahid Pervaiz said emergency has been declared in all hospitals of Hyderabad, Jamshoro and Sehwan Sharif.

nodes.description: Edhi基金会调度周边城市救护车运输伤者，救援人员称死亡人数可能达60-65人
nodes.support_text: Edhi Foundation chief Faisal Edhi said that all ambulances from the nearby cities were sent to Sehwan Sharif to transport the injured to hospitals.

nodes.description: 总理夏里夫谴责袭击，称其威胁巴基斯坦的包容性未来和真纳精神
nodes.support_text: “The attack on the shrines of Lal Shahbaz Qalandar represents an attack on the progressive, inclusive future of Pakistan; one where every man woman and child is entitled to life, liberty and property in the pursuit of happiness no matter their religion,” a statement by PM Sharif said.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国家武装力量（ISPR）宣布调派海军直升机和C-130军机进行伤员转运
nodes.support_text: ISPR says that night flying naval helicopter and C 130 aircraft of Pakistan Air Force (PAF) are being sent for quick evacuation of people injured in a suicide blast at Lal Shahbaz Qalandar shrine in Sehwan Sharif.

nodes.description: 军方在爆炸现场部署陆军和边防部队参与救援行动
nodes.support_text: He said armed forces have placed all required resources for rescue effort. 'Army and Rangers are doing rescue effort at site,' he added.

nodes.description: 文本提及2022年11月Shah Noorani清真寺自杀爆炸案造成52人死亡
nodes.support_text: This is not the first time a Sufi shrine has been hit by terrorists. In November last year, a suicide blast at Shah Noorani shrine killed 52 people and injured more than 100.

edges.support_text: The explosion took place at the spot where the dhamaal (Sufi ritual) was being performed, within the premises of the shrine.
Hyderabad Commissioner Qazi Shahid Pervaiz said emergency has been declared in all hospitals of Hyderabad, Jamshoro and Sehwan Sharif.
Edhi Foundation chief Faisal Edhi said that all ambulances from the nearby cities were sent to Sehwan Sharif to transport the injured to hospitals.
‘The attack on the shrines of Lal Shahbaz Qalandar represents an attack on the progressive, inclusive future of Pakistan…’ a statement by PM Sharif said.

ISPR says that night flying naval helicopter and C 130 aircraft of Pakistan Air Force (PAF) are being sent for quick evacuation of people injured in a suicide blast at Lal Shahbaz Qalandar shrine in Sehwan Sharif.
He said armed forces have placed all required resources for rescue effort. 'Army and Rangers are doing rescue effort at site,' he added.
Senior police officer Shabbir Sethar told Reuters from a local hospital that the death toll was likely to rise. 'At least 72 are dead and over 150 have been injured,' Sethar said by telephone
The injured were shifted to Liauqat Medical College, Jamshoro and other hospitals of Dadu and Hyderabad.
‘The attack on one of us, is an attack on all,’ he said.
This is not the first time a Sufi shrine has been hit by terrorists. In November last year, a suicide blast at Shah Noorani shrine killed 52 people and injured more than 100.
